error.account_locked: Account locked. Please try again later.

user.description: Please enter the email address and password you use to log into the MyMazda mobile app.

send_poi.description: Sends a GPS location to the vehicle's navigation system as a POI (Point of Interest). Requires a navigation SD card installed in the vehicle.

device_id.description: The vehicle to send the GPS location to.
device_id.name: Vehicle

latitude.description: The latitude of the location to send.
latitude.name: Latitude

longitude.description: The longitude of the location to send.
longitude.name: Longitude

poi_name.description: A friendly name for the location.
poi_name.name: POI name

send_poi.name: Send POI
